mapper.select: SELECT CR_NAME AS CRNAME ,CR_ACCODE AS ACCODE,CR_CODE AS CRCODE FROM CR WHERE CR_ACCODE=#{acCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "CL"(CL_CRACCODE,CL_CRCODE,CL_CODE,CL_NAME,CL_FEE,CL_SDATE,CL_EDATE) VALUES(#{acCode},#{crCode},'C'||(SELECT SUBSTR(MAX(CL_CODE),2)+1 FROM "CL" WHERE CL_CRACCODE=#{acCode}), #{clName},#{clFee},#{clSdate},#{clEdate})
mapper.select: SELECT CR_ACCODE AS ACCODE, CR_CODE AS CRCODE, CR_NAME AS CRNAME, CL_CODE AS CLCODE, CL_NAME AS CLNAME, CL_FEE AS CLFEE, CL_SDATE AS CLSDATE, CL_EDATE AS CLEDATE FROM "CL" INNER JOIN CR ON "CL".CL_CRACCODE = CR.CR_ACCODE AND CR.CR_CODE="CL".CL_CRCODE WHERE CL_CRACCODE=#{acCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE "CL" SET CL_NAME=#{clName},CL_FEE=#{clFee},CL_SDATE=#{clSdate},CL_EDATE=#{clEdate} WHERE CL_CRACCODE=#{acCode} AND CL_CRCODE=#{crCode} AND CL_CODE=#{clCode}
mapper.select: SELECT TA_ACCODE AS ACCODE, TC_CODE AS TEACHERID, TC_NAME AS TNAME, TC_EMAIL AS TEMAIL FROM TC INNER JOIN TA ON TC.TC_CODE=TA.TA_TCCODE WHERE TC_NAME LIKE '%'||#{tName}||'%' AND TA_ACCODE=#{acCode}

SELECT CR_NAME AS CRNAME ,SB_ACODE AS SMCODE,SB_ASCODE AS SUBJECTCODE ,SB_ASNAME AS SUBJECTNAME,SB_CLCRACCODE AS ACCODE,SB_CLCRCODE AS CRCODE, SB_CLCODE AS CLCODE,CL_NAME AS CLNAME ,SB_TCCODE AS TEACHERID,TC_NAME AS TNAME,SB_WEEKDAY AS WEEKDAY,SB_STIME AS STIME,SB_ETIME AS ETIME FROM SB INNER JOIN CR ON CR.CR_ACCODE=SB.SB_CLCRACCODE AND CR.CR_CODE=SB.SB_CLCRCODE INNER JOIN TC ON SB.SB_TCCODE=TC.TC_CODE INNER JOIN "CL" ON SB.SB_CLCODE="CL".CL_CODE WHERE SB_CLCRACCODE=#{acCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE SB SET SB_WEEKDAY=#{weekDay},SB_STIME=#{sTime},SB_ETIME=#{eTime} WHERE SB_ACODE=#{smCode} AND SB_CLCRACCODE=#{acCode} AND SB_CLCRCODE=#{crCode} AND SB_CLCODE=#{clCode} AND SB_TCCODE=#{teacherId} AND SB_ASCODE=#{subjectCode}
mapper.select: SELECT SB_ACODE AS SMCODE, TC_NAME AS TNAME, AC_NAME AS ACNAME, CL_NAME AS CLNAME, SB_ASNAME AS SUBJECTNAME, SB_STIME AS STIME, SB_ETIME AS ETIME, SB_WEEKDAY AS WEEKDAY, CL_SDATE AS STARTDAY, CL_EDATE AS ENDDAY, AT_COCODE AS ATTEND FROM BS INNER JOIN SB ON BS.BS_CLCRACCODE=BS.BS_CLCRACCODE AND BS.BS_CLCRCODE=SB.SB_CLCRCODE AND BS.BS_CLCODE=SB.SB_CLCODE INNER JOIN AC ON BS.BS_CLCRACCODE=AC.AC_CODE INNER JOIN CL ON BS.BS_CLCRACCODE=CL.CL_CRACCODE AND BS.BS_CLCRCODE=CL.CL_CRCODE AND BS.BS_CLCODE=CL.CL_CODE INNER JOIN TC ON SB.SB_TCCODE=TC.TC_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN AT ON AT.AT_SBACODE=SB.SB_ACODE AND AT.AT_STCODE=BS.BS_STCODE WHERE BS.BS_STCODE=#{userId}

SELECT AC_NAME AS ACNAME, CL_NAME AS CLNAME, SB_ASNAME AS SUBJECTNAME, SB_WEEKDAY AS WEEKDAY, SB_STIME AS STIME, SB_ETIME AS ETIME, CL_SDATE AS STARTDAY, CL_EDATE AS ENDDAY, ' ' AS TNAME FROM SB INNER JOIN AC ON SB.SB_CLCRACCODE=AC.AC_CODE INNER JOIN CL ON SB.SB_CLCODE=CL.CL_CODE WHERE SB_TCCODE=#{userId}
SELECT ST_CODE AS STUDENTID, ST_NAME AS SNAME, ST_EMAIL AS SEMAIL, SA_ACCODE AS ACCODE FROM ST INNER JOIN SA ON ST.ST_CODE=SA.SA_STCODE WHERE ST_NAME LIKE '%'||#{sName}||'%'

SELECT BS_STCODE AS STUDENTID, ST_NAME AS SNAME, ST_EMAIL AS SEMAIL, BS_CLCRACCODE AS ACCODE, BS_CLCRCODE AS CRCODE, BS_CLCODE AS CLCODE FROM BS INNER JOIN ST ON BS.BS_STCODE=ST.ST_CODE WHERE BS_CLCRCODE=#{crCode} AND BS_CLCODE=#{clCode} AND BS_CLCRACCODE=#{acCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM (SELECT FE_COCODE FROM FE WHERE FE_CLCRACCODE='1024588469' AND FE_CLCRCODE='CR101' AND FE_CLCODE='C1001' AND FE_STCODE='S1004';) WHERE FE_COCODE=14;
mapper.select: SELECT AC_CODE AS ACCODE, AC_NAME AS ACNAME, AC_ADDRESS AS ACADDRESS FROM AC WHERE AC_NAME LIKE '%'||#{acName}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SA(SA_STCODE, SA_ACCODE, SA_COCODE) SELECT #{userId},#{acCode},12 FROM DUAL A WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 0 FROM SA WHERE SA_STCODE= #{userId} AND SA_ACCODE=#{acCode})
INSERT INTO TA(TA_TCCODE, TA_ACCODE, TA_PASSWORD) SELECT #{userId},#{acCode},4321 FROM DUAL A WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 0 FROM TA WHERE TA_TCCODE= #{userId} AND TA_ACCODE=#{acCode})
mapper.select: SELECT PR_CODE AS PRCODE, PR_NAME AS PRNAME FROM PR WHERE PR_EMAIL=#{pEmail}
SELECT NVL(MAX(SP_COCODE),0) FROM SP WHERE SP_STCODE=#{userId} AND SP_PRCODE=#{prCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SP(SP_STCODE, SP_PRCODE, SP_COCODE) VALUES(#{userId}, #{prCode}, 12)
mapper.select: SELECT ST_EMAIL AS SEMAIL, PR_EMAIL AS PEMAIL FROM SP INNER JOIN ST ON ST.ST_CODE=SP_STCODE INNER JOIN PR ON PR.PR_CODE=SP_PRCODE WHERE SP_STCODE=#{userId} AND SP_PRCODE=#{prCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE SP SET SP_COCODE=11 WHERE SP_STCODE=#{userId} AND SP_PRCODE=#{prCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE SP WHERE SP_STCODE=#{userId} AND SP_PRCODE=#{prCode}
